name: I_AM_BROKEN (GGJ2020)
description:
T10 came back to life in the junkyard, the robot's graveyard, missing some of his core functions.

He will have to use spare parts repair himself, with the sources for the parts slowly becoming more and more questionable...

Use A & D or the arrow keys to move. Use SPACE to jump Use CTRL or Mouse1 to attack (once possible).
